Gibson - 2013 Les Paul Traditional 2013 Gibson USA Les Paul Traditional gloss Chicago Blue . Great Condition overall! The 2013 Les Paul Traditional's were some of the best guitars that Gibson has made in recent years. These guitars are sought after by players due to the solid body and 50's neck profile. There are some surface swirls, small depressions and hairline scratches from being polished but these are nothing serious. The bound Carved Top is Made of lightly figured maple and the body is mahogany that is not chambered or weight relieved. The guitar features a rounded 50's profile mahogany neck with 22 frets, rosewood fingerboard, pearloid trapezoid inlays, Corian nut, vintage style tuners, chrome hardware and a Nashville bridge. Tone is supplied by a pair of chrome covered '57 Classic Humbucker pickups that deliver all the warm and sweet Les Paul tone you can handle!
